name: Together in the Void
description:
The plasma orbs love each other. It's your job to re-unite them.

----

This is my Ludum Dare 37 entry. It's really a series of experiments with raymarching, to see what mechanics I could come up with.

And alternate name could be: Look Ma, No Polygons! :)

I'd love to hear your feedback:

Twitter: @stevenvass

Reddit: procedural_love

Thanks for playing!

(P.S. Here is the source.)

(P.P.S. Don't use this to learn about raymarching, start with this tutorial instead.)
